Certificates.title: Certificates
Certificates.description: Here are some of my certificates

hero.heroDescription: Transforming ideas into seamless web experiences

Resume.title: Experience
Resume.bullet1: Fullstack Developer with over 3 years of experience, focused on Frontend with Next.js and TypeScript, building modern, scalable, and high-performance user interfaces.
Resume.bullet2: Experienced in developing critical applications such as digital wallets, optimizing global state management with Zustand and implementing scalable styling using Tailwind CSS.
Resume.bullet3: Strong Backend foundation, enabling effective collaboration between UX/UI and API development teams, ensuring smooth implementation and a modular, efficient architecture.
